QuestData.Title: Blacktalon Intel
QuestData.Description:
While Selistra and I attracted their eyes above, shadows crept in through their defenses.
My agents, the Blacktalon, are keeping an eye and an ear throughout the keep. Meet them and let them know you're on our side. They'll give you some valuable information on our enemies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Wrathion's spies hidden around Scalecracker Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: That is troubling, to say the least. Yet another reason to fight them.
